short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize start/end times for videos in your playlist. Enjoy uninterrupted music playlists with precise playback control.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To enhance your experience with music playlists and eliminate the annoyance of dead time in music videos, follow these steps:

1. Click the clock icon in the video player.
2. Set the start and end times using the current video time.
3. Refresh the page.

Now, the video will automatically start and stop at your specified times. This feature is especially handy for creating seamless music playlists without unnecessary interruptions.
